articles.author: ABC7 Chicago Digital
articles.title: Indian national Praneeth Kumar Usiripalli charged in alleged plane stabbing on Lufthansa flight from Chicago to Germany: DOJ - ABC7 Chicago
articles.description: A man has been charged with allegedly stabbing two teenage boys with a metal fork on a flight from Chicago to Germany on Saturday, the Department of Justice said.
articles.content:
CHICAGO (WLS) -- A man has been charged with allegedly stabbing two teenage boys with a metal fork on a flight from Chicago to Germany on Saturday, the Department of Justice said.
